background.description: Default background color for the entire app.

backdrop.description: Used for background color of the backdrop component for navigation and modal.

default.description: Used for background color of Card, Modal, Sheet, and Popover.

default-subtle.description: Subtle version of default surface color.

default-hover.description: Used for hovered background color of Card, Modal, Sheet, and Popover.

default-active.description: Used for pressed background color of Card, Modal, Sheet, and Popover.

default-strong.description: Used for background color of neutral elements including badges.

dark.description: Dark version of default surface color.

dark-hover.description: Dark version of default hovered surface color.

dark-active.description: Dark version of default pressed surface color.

info.description: Used for background color of informational elements including banners.

info-hover.description: Used for hovered background color of informational elements including banners.

info-active.description: Used for pressed background color of informational elements including banners.

info-strong.description: Used for background color of informational elements including badges.

success.description: Used for background color of success elements including banners.

success-hover.description: Used for hovered background color of success elements including banners.

success-active.description: Used for pressed background color of success elements including banners.

success-strong.description: Used for background color of success elements including badges.

warning.description: Used for background color of warning elements including banners.

warning-hover.description: Used for hovered background color of warning elements including banners.

warning-active.description: Used for pressed background color of warning elements including banners.

warning-strong.description: Used for background color of warning elements including badges.

critical.description: Used for background color of critical elements including banners.

critical-hover.description: Used for hovered background color of critical elements including banners and menu items.

critical-active.description: Used for pressed background color of critical elements including banners and menu items.

critical-strong.description: Used for background color of critical elements including badges.

selected.description: Used for background color in selected interactive elements like lists.

selected-hover.description: Used for hovered background color in selected interactive elements like lists.

selected-active.description: Used for pressed background color in selected interactive elements like lists.

primary.description: Used for background color in selected interactive states in navigation and tabs.

primary-hover.description: Used for hovered background color in selected interactive states in navigation and tabs.

primary-active.description: Used for pressed background color in selected interactive states in navigation and tabs.

primary-strong.description: Used for background color of special elements including badges.

default.description: Default text color. Use it for Titles, Headings, Body copy etc.

subtle.description: Subtle version of default text color. Use it for UI labels and text heavy layouts.

weak.description: Secondary text color. Use it to show type hierarchy.

disabled.description: Disabled text and placeholder text color.

primary.description: Primary text color on light surfaces.

primary-hover.description: Primary hovered text color on light surfaces.

primary-active.description: Primary pressed text color on light surfaces.

info.description: Text color for inert informational elements.

success.description: Text color for inert success elements.

warning.description: Text color for inert warning elements like error message.

critical.description: Text color for inert critical elements like error message.

inverse-subtle.description: Secondary text color to be used as translucent white on dark colored surfaces.

on-dark.description: Default text color on dark surfaces.

weak-on-dark.description: Secondary text color on dark surfaces.

primary.description: Primary icon color on light surfaces.

inverse-subtle.description: Secondary icon color to be used as translucent white on dark colored surfaces.

default-subtle.description: Subtle version of default border color.

default-weak.description: Border color for elements like dividers within tables.

default-hover.description: Subtle version of hovered default border color.

dark.description: Dark version of default border color.

dark-subtle.description: Dark version of subtle default border color.

dark-hover.description: Dark version of hovered default border color.

info-subtle.description: Subtle version of border color for informational elements.

success-subtle.description: Subtle version of border color for success elements.

warning-subtle.description: Subtle version of border color for warning elements.

critical-subtle.description: Subtle version of border color for critical elements.

primary-default.description: Border color for primary, special, and brand related elements.

brand-subtle.description: Subtle version of border color for primary, special, and brand related elements.

primary.description: Background color for primary actions, fill color for icons, text color in navigation and tabs.

primary-hover.description: Background color for primary actions, fill color for icons, text color in navigation and tabs in hovered state.

primary-active.description: Background color for primary actions, fill color for icons, text color in navigation and tabs in pressed state.

primary-selected.description: Background color for primary actions, fill color for icons, text color in navigation and tabs in selected state.

secondary.description: Background color for secondary and tertiary actions like buttons.

secondary-hover.description: Background color for secondary and tertiary actions like buttons in hovered state.

secondary-active.description: Background color for secondary and tertiary actions like buttons in pressed state.

secondary-selected.description: Background color for secondary and tertiary actions like buttons in selected state.

critical.description: Background color for critical actions like buttons and toast messages.

critical-hover.description: Background color for critical actions like buttons and toast messages in hovered state.

critical-active.description: Background color for critical actions like buttons and toast messages in pressed state.

critical-selected.description: Background color for critical actions like buttons and toast messages in selected state.

primary.description: Used for links, text buttons, checkboxes etc.

primary-hover.description: Used for hovered links, text buttons, checkboxes etc.

primary-active.description: Used for pressed links, text buttons, checkboxes etc.

critical.description: Used for destructive interactive elements like links, text buttons, error states of checkboxes etc. Not used for critical banners and badges.

critical-hover.description: Used for hovered destructive interactive elements like links, text buttons, error states of checkboxes etc. Not used for critical banners and badges.

critical-active.description: Used for pressed destructive interactive elements like links, text buttons, error states of checkboxes etc. Not used for critical banners and badges.

primary-on-dark.description: Used for links, text buttons, checkboxes etc. on dark surfaces.

primary-on-dark-hover.description: Used for hovered links, text buttons, checkboxes etc. on dark surfaces.

primary-on-dark-active.description: Used for pressed links, text buttons, checkboxes etc. on dark surfaces.
